pageContext.claim: “But if you look throughout the world, the countries with a powerful death penalty -- death penalty -- with a fair but quick trial, they have very little, if any, drug problem.”
pageContext.analysis: Many countries that employ the death penalty for drug offenses do appear to have a smaller drug problem, but they also tend to be authoritarian regimes with unreliable data. Moreover, the UN Human Rights Committee has said the practice is against international law.
